## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: cb-511-73649691
* **Amendment Number**: 9
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-58141
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-23
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-17T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-23
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-01-31
* **Tender Status**: Expiré
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Procurement Overview

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites interested bids for the supply, delivery, installation and commissioning of a Differential Scanning Calorimeter (DSC) system. The proposed system must be capable of detecting various thermal events, including multiple melting peaks and transitions, and measuring physical and chemical changes involving endothermic or exothermic processes.

## Technical Requirements

The DSC system must have a modulated temperature capability to separate overlapping transitions and complex thermal events. It must also be able to detect various thermal properties of thermoplastic and thermoset polymers, composites, polymer blends, multilayer polymer films and laminates, organic and inorganic substances, and various chemicals.

## Contract Awarding

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submission. The winner must complete the supply, delivery, installation and commissioning of the system and provide training on equipment use within the specified timeline.
